alert.note: Alert for Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Outagamie County through 515 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New London, or 14 miles northwest of Appleton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Appleton, Black Creek and Little Chute. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.
